EmailTemplate.description: When lead gets generated we will send this email template to the lead email id.
EmailTemplate.name: Web Lead Response Email template
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName} for contacting MZ group we will update you soon.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
We have received your inquiry details and our Sales reps are working on it. We will contact you soon.
Thanks Sales Team, MindZcloud Group
